title: Sci-fi extraction shooter 'Marathon' is coming March 5, with new trailer showcasing all-star voice cast, collector's edition & more (video)
description: Bungie's next game returns with a new in-engine trailer and more details ahead of its long-awaited release.
content: Bungie's next game returns with a new in-engine trailer and more details ahead of its long-awaited release.
